metadata.title: CVE-2022-25883 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to RegularExpression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range, whenuntrusted user data is provided as a range.

criterions.comment: node-semver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
